mapper.select: SELECT cli_nm , prd_nm , prd_color , prd_size , prd_height , odd_cnt , odd_sts , ord_reg_date FROM vw_suju_summary WHERE odd_isapproval = 'y' ORDER BY ord_reg_date DESC FETCH FIRST 20 ROWS ONLY

SELECT prd_nm , prd_color , prd_size , prd_height , odd_sts , ord_mod_date FROM vw_suju_summary WHERE odd_sts IN ( '작업 완료', '출고 대기(공장 > 창고)', '창고 대기', '출고 검사', '출고 완료' ) AND odd_isapproval = 'y' ORDER BY ord_mod_date DESC FETCH FIRST 20 ROWS ONLY
SELECT SUM(odd_actual_cnt) AS yesterCnt FROM suju_order_detail WHERE TRUNC(odd_mod_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1) AND odd_isapproval = 'y'

SELECT CASE WHEN before.qty = 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND(((yester.qty - before.qty) / before.qty) * 100, 0) END AS rate FROM (SELECT NVL(SUM(odd_actual_cnt), 0) AS qty FROM suju_order_detail WHERE TRUNC(odd_mod_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1) -- AND odd_isapproval = 'y' ) yester, (SELECT NVL(SUM(odd_actual_cnt), 0) AS qty FROM suju_order_detail WHERE TRUNC(odd_mod_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 2) -- AND odd_isapproval = 'y' ) before
SELECT SUM(odd_actual_cnt) AS monthCnt FROM suju_order_detail -- WHERE odd_isapproval = 'y' WHERE TRUNC(odd_mod_date) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT CASE WHEN prev.qty = 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND(((curr.qty - prev.qty) / prev.qty) * 100, 0) END AS rate FROM (SELECT NVL(SUM(odd_actual_cnt), 0) AS qty FROM suju_order_detail WHERE odd_mod_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ) curr, (SELECT NVL(SUM(odd_actual_cnt), 0) AS qty FROM suju_order_detail WHERE odd_mod_date >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) AND odd_mod_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') ) prev
